item.title: Shiny apps with GNIP data
item.description: (in progress) This is a collection of links to basic Shiny apps using data from the Global Networks of Isotopes in Precipitaion (IAEA/WMO, 2020). Apps are hosted on shinyapps.io, and some of the code can be found across my GitHub repos. Level 0 My very first app uses the RStudio sample Shiny code to create an adjustable histogram, with data from GNIP instead of “Old Faithful” sample data. This demonstrates a deployed app using data from a .
